text: “ ‘Gu vhɨra ntige buni havhari mbari ndun ki. Nde gumgi mbari Pergamuman ki, mbe Baraman tɨvi, mbe nta suira havhargi. Baraman tɨvi khaŋ muuŋgi. Ana fhum Isreriŋ gumgi gu mbigi guiguigirga tɨvir Barak khɨvigim, ana mbe muuŋgim, mbe regap, tɨvi mbatɨgi ga muuŋgi. Barak mbara hɨgap, Isreriŋ ga ruga khɨngim, mbe mbarɨvi gu tori ofa muuŋgi sɨgi mbegav, mbe fhura ferferap, ruarir gumgi gu mbigi wari ndi tɨvi ga muuŋgi.
